title: Helen Whately – 2021 Comments on Care Home Residents Being Allowed Visitors
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Helen Whately, the Minister for Care, on 20 February 2021.
content:
One of the hardest things during this pandemic has been seeing families desperate to be reunited with their loved ones kept apart and I absolutely want to bring them back together.
